body.name: Top Race Take Apart Toys with Battery Powered Drill - 3-in-1 Take Apart Truck with Remote Control - Easy Assembly Construction Truck with Drill for Kids Builds Imagination and Building Skills
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 46 mins
features: 🚧 BUILD AND DISASSEMBLE TRUCKS - Unleash your child's inner mechanic with Top Race DIY construction truck set. Easy-to-assemble toy for hours of creative play.
🔩 SIMPLE ASSEMBLY WITH BATTERY-POWERED DRILL - The package includes a battery-powered drill and easy-to-follow instructions, ensuring straightforward assembly for children of all ages.
▶️ CONVERTIBLE SKID STEER TOY - This versatile set allows kids to transform the battery-powered drill into skid steer toy. With various functions to explore, it guarantees endless entertainment.
🚚 BUILD 3 TRUCKS WITH 49 PIECES - Unlock your child's engineering potential with 49 pieces to build three distinct construction trucks: a dump truck, cement truck, and crane truck.
🎮 REMOTE CONTROLLED FUN - Experience fun with remote control action from a distance of over 100 feet, complemented by realistic truck sounds. Ideal for ages 3 and up. (Batteries not included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as a Christmas gift for grandson. Fun to put together and play with. Very sturdy and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My grandsons love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pros and cons
reviews.reviewText: I would like to start by saying thank you for the thank you card! My son and I love the toy and my son still plays with it all the time! He just got introduced to Transformers which revived his interest in the toy since it can be changed from one truck to another. Seeing as how this is one of the most played with toys my son has ever had, and since I've never received a thank you card from a small business before, I feel it is only necessary for me to give you a very sincere and honest review. I hope that my criticism helps you to learn and grow as a company and I wish the best for you! I'll start with the positives.Pros: The overall concept of this toy is absolutely wonderful! It is the perfect difficultly level for my son who just turned 4! It is not too difficult to where he gets extremely frustrated, but it also has enough parts that it keeps him thinking. Some parts have to be put together in a specific order which is great for his motor skills and understanding, but it also blew his mind when I turned the crane around and called it a tow-truck! (He loves tow-trucks too!) He loves to use his imagination and pretend that something is wrong with the truck and that he is the mechanic for the job! I also love that it is very interactive! My son loves his Dada and always wants to help with all my projects that are much more dangerous and some are even too dangerous for me to allow him to help, so this is the perfect opportunity to reverse rolls. He enjoys being in charge and deciding who gets specific jobs and it is a great toy for bonding! Unfortunately, I do have a couple cons though and they both have to do with the motor/controller functions.Cons: I really like that you can remove the motor and transfer it to the controller to use as a drill and my son loves it as well, but it was pretty disappointing when used as the motor in the truck for a couple reasons. The first is lack of power. It doesn't necessarily need to go extremely fast, but it can't even get over the tiniest bumps which really limits the travel range. In addition to that, the switch on the motor can only face down so when you do attempt to go over a bump, guess what happens? Yup, it flips the switch! My last issue with this is that it doesn't turn, which again, limits the abilities of what you can do with this toy. It was so sad because my son would get so excited about the truck when he would put it together and have it all ready to go, and then you would see his excitement slowly fade away once he tries to control it to go somewhere...Well there it is. My overall opinion is that it is an amazing toy and concept, but I feel that it could be so much more if it had more capabilities as a remote control. That alone was the only reason I didn't purchase one of the other models. Maybe even make more advanced levels that have controls to dump the truck or operate the crane! My son is very curious when it comes to moving equipment, and if it can move, he wants to move it! I hope that this was a helpful review and I thank you again for the incredible toy. I would absolutely will, and have recommended it to more than a few friends.

reviews.reviewText: Buen producto, pero le serviría mucho ser más grande, pero por los tornillos y su movilidad es excelente.A quién lo compré recuerde que solo es un carrito (una cabina) y la parte trasera es intercambiable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Un juguete para trabajar la mente!
reviews.reviewText: Nos da las instrucciones para montar los diferentes modelos de camiones haciéndoles elegir piezas concretas y montarlas en el lugar correcto.
Bien mais trop de piles,donc a la longue pas trop ecologique

Das Auto war ein Weihnachtsgeschenk für mein Enkelkind, 3 Jahre alt. Er spielt sehr gern damit. Die Feuerwehr ist sehr robust. Man kann die Aufbauten wechseln. Mit der Fernbedienung kann man sie vor und zurück fahren lassen. Der Motor funktionierte nicht, aber nach einer Email an den Händler gab es problemlos und schnell Ersatz.
